summary: 📌 Disease: Durian Allocaridara Attack (Allocaridina cornea) 💥 Cause: Infestation by the durian borer Allocaridina cornea 😷 Symptoms: Holes in the fruit and browning of pulp, dead branches on trees 💊 Treatment & Prevention: Use pesticides and traps to control borers. Prune and remove affected branches. Regularly inspect the durian trees, especially during infestation seasons. Chemical treatment before flowering and fumigation of storage can also help prevent attacks.
